00025 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_RANGE_WIDGET_H_
00026 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_RANGE_WIDGET_H_
00027 
00028 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00029 
00030 namespace mimas {
00031 
00032 class RangeWidget
00033 {
00034 public:
00035   RangeWidget()
00036    : min_(0.0),
00037      max_(1.0),
00038      value_(0.0),
00039      remote_value_(0.0),
00040      is_dragged_(false) {}
00041 
00042   virtual ~RangeWidget() {}
00043 
00044   double value() const {
00045     return value_;
00046   }
00047 
00048   void setRange(double min, double max) {
00049     min_ = min;
00050     max_ = max;
00051   }
00052 
00054   int position(double range) {
00055     if (max_ - min_ == 0) return 0;
00056     return (int)((value_ * range / (max_ - min_)) + 0.5f);
00057   }
00058 
00061   int remotePosition(double range) {
00062     if (max_ - min_ == 0) return 0;
00063     return (int)((remote_value_ * range / (max_ - min_)) + 0.5f);
00064   }
00065 
00070   bool setPosition(double position, double range) {
00071     if (!range) return false;
00072     double r = position * (max_ - min_) / range;
00073     if (r < min_) r = min_;
00074     if (r > max_) r = max_;
00075     if (value_ != r) {
00076       value_ = r;
00077       return true;
00078     }
00079     return false;
00080   }
00081 
00082   bool isDragged() const {
00083     return is_dragged_;
00084   }
00085 
00086   void setDragged(bool dragged) {
00087     is_dragged_ = dragged;
00088   }
00089 
00094   bool setValue(double remote_value) {
00095     if (remote_value_ != remote_value) {
00096       remote_value_ = remote_value;
00097 
00098       if (!is_dragged_) {
00099         // no dragging
00100         //if (last_drag_ < 0 || last_drag_ + (3 * proxy_->latency()) < proxy_->elapsed()) {
00101           // we stopped dragging long ago, move real.
00102           value_ = remote_value;
00103         //}
00104       }
00105 
00106       return true;
00107     }
00108     return false;
00109   }
00110 
00111 private:
00114   double min_;
00115 
00118   double max_;
00119 
00122   double value_;
00123 
00126   double remote_value_;
00127 
00130   bool is_dragged_;
00131 };
00132 
00133 } // mimas
00134 
00135 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_RANGE_WIDGET_H_
